1.title: I have a question, who do i ask?
1.html:
Use the "Send feedback" menu section to ask us anything.
We will update the FAQ section with the most popular questions.

2.title: How do i change password?
2.html:
To change the password you simply have to log-out and register your summoner again with a new password.
All your information(Teams, games played, etc) will be kept safe and won't be lost.

3.title: Report text
3.html: Texts flagged as inappropriate will be forwarded to our moderators. Once reviewed, if proven to break our guidelines and values, these texts will be blocked.

4.title: How can I create a tournament?
4.html:
To create a tournament simply contact us via one of the following social networks:

  • https://www.instagram.com/euwlolsquare
  • https://www.facebook.com/Euwlolsquare
